phrases: It is the start of Inuyasha!
We are going to gatherevery shard of the Sacred Jewel...
And I will destroy Naraku with my Tetsusaiga!
They seem to be total opposites,
but they have one thing in common.
They are both on really bad terms with Inuyasha.
It is noteasy looking forfood in unfamiliar territory.
A little earlier we could have attacked a human village.
But Koga ordered us not to botherhumans anymore.
And if we did, Kagome would hate us for it.
You can eat whateveryou like in this village.
Rin was once attacked by wolves.
Besides, who would you think we are?
We are the trusted henchmen of Koga,
the young leader of the Wolf-Demon Tribe.
It has been several centuries since I began serving Lord Sesshomaru!
Crossed through three thousand worlds have I, his most loyal follower!
Never heard of you nor Sesshomaru!
How dare you insult Lord Sesshomaru!
Were not you going to catch fish?
Did not we see him before?
Say... the name Sesshomaru rings a bell.
Anyway, let us go back to Koga.
Why are you wandering around here, mutt?!
I am looking for Naraku and I end up running into you!
You do not need to butt into this.
I am going to get Naraku!
I still have not located Naraku.
You would betternot be thinking about attacking a village.
As if we would attack humans.
I will catch a boar ortwo in no time.
He even tried to eat me before.
He does not want Kagome to hate him.
I guess even Koga defers to how Kagome feels.
The last of Kagome's special ninja snacks!
Kagome, so you are worried about me.
No need to give it to HIM!
I cannot stand that smell of yours!
Do not insult me, you puny wolf!
What kind of guy is this Sesshomaru?
Well, he doesn'tget along with Inuyasha.
And has an evil sword named Tokijin.
And he is extremely strong and a bit cold-hearted.
Inuyasha and Koga can fight like that,
but they would neverkill each other.
But Sesshomaru would not hesitate to kill his opponent.
But maybe he is changed lately.
He does not seem as cold-hearted as before.
Hey, I told you guys to stop!
I guess he was a dangerous opponent.
Good thing we did not engage him.
I am getting tired of this.
I think it will be settled soon.
Kagome, I will think of this as a token of your love.
Things have calmed down at last.
Let us go to the next village as planned.
This does not smell like meat, but it is good!
Hey, if we go this way...
There was a riverup a ways.
Then let us go upriver some more.
Why go through so much trouble?
Why must I avoid Inuyasha's older brother?!
He will go start a fight himself.
What is with ordering me around?!
We are not ordering you around, Koga.
I want to go this way.
We do not want to follow!
That is why we are stopping you!
We do not want to go there!
You do not want to follow me?
Koga, what a thing to say to us!
You do not even understand how we feel!
You have a Sacred Jewel shard!
Ourvillage was tormented by that demon.
There is been an increase in demons lately.
You must spend the night with us!
We can accept their hospitality withoutguilt tonight.
Especially since there is no reason forMiroku
in a village that was under attack by demons.
How could he say such things when we are worried about him?
He is too arrogant... just'cuz he is the young boss.
Maybe we should go serve Kagome.
Kagome would not ever treat us like this!
And he is just as rough.
You are not from around here.
Koga would never abandon a comrade!
This is happening because Koga came this far!
He just wanted to go after Naraku and did not think.
He said Naraku was unforgivable forkilling our comrades...
Why do not we give up about finding Naraku's castle?
Naraku slaughtered all ourfriends and family!
But there is no way to find him!
I will beat that Naraku to death!
Orelse, ourdead comrades will not everforgive me!
This journey is a vendetta for ourlost comrades.
He is rough, but he cherishes all his comrades.
He saved us a number of times, too.
Lord Sesshomaru, he is the one!
What shall we do, Lord Sesshomaru?
We are the right- and left-hand men of Koga,
the great young boss of the Wolf-Demon Tribe.
But Sesshomaru would not hesitate to kill his opponent.
We will have a better chance of making it alive
if we drag Koga away from here.
Let us get Koga away from here!
Boy, it is starting to smell just like that mutt!
So he is not a half-demon?
Do not you dare eat humans!
Is that all right, Lord Sesshomaru?
Koga's wolves were the ones that attacked Rin.
If he tried the same thing, I would kill him.
But the one I am after now is Naraku.
I do not need unnecessary battles.
Jaken, you will be left behind.
Kagome probably gave it to me to share.
Why did you say all that crazy stuff?
you would start fighting with that Sesshomaru.
One day, I will defeat that Inuyasha who keeps hanging around Kagome.
But I have no gripe with his olderbrother.
You were worried over a stupid thing like that?!
But Sesshomaru might have started a fight with you!
Why is he letting a little kid like that string along?
Kagome's a pretty girl, so I would understand.
But a young kid like that?
You guys think I would lose to him?!
Well then, I will go settle this right now!
An awful smell's coming this way.
What are you doing here so early?!
I guess girls like stuff like this.
Koga has certainly changed since we first encountered him.
Inuyasha must change much more and grow up.
We are going to find Naraku today!
Kagome and the others are trapped in the cocoon
An evil nightmare from the heart creates fear and despair!
Is yourpower so weak as to be overpowered by a dream?
Next on Inuyasha: The Truth Behind the Nightmare: Battle in the Forest of Sorrow
